com.pega.pegarules.pub.context

Interface PRCluster

  • Deprecated. 
    The entire PRCluster project is deprecated in favor of the modularized cluster in platform/kernel/cluster. This project will eventually be removed sometime post 7.3. See: platform/kernel/cluster/README.MD for more information and instructions. Contact GenesisTeam@pega.com if you have any questions

    @Deprecated
public interface PRCluster
    interface to the engine's cluster-tracking component. PRCluster

      • checkMembershipConsistency

        boolean checkMembershipConsistency()
        Deprecated. 
        An implementation-specific check of cluster membership consistency. This should check the members of the cluster against what PRPC sees as valid nodes. If nodes exist in the cluster that are not present in PRPC, false is returned. This may simply be because a node has joined the cluster at startup, but has not yet registered in PRPC, which is why this shouldn't throw an exception in this case.
        Returns:
        true if the cluster is consistent, false if there are cluster members that are not (yet) in PRPC.

      • checkProtocolConsistency

        boolean checkProtocolConsistency()
        Deprecated. 
        Checks that active members in the cluster are using the same cluster protocol. In the case that this node determines that other nodes are not using the same protocol or if this node is using a different protocol than that of all other nodes, we log an error/warn message and handle as appropriate.
        Returns:
        True if the cluster protocol is consistent, false if all nodes do not share the same protocol

      • alterState

        void alterState(ClusterState aState)
        Deprecated. 
        alters the state of the cluster.
        Parameters:
        aState - - new state that should be entered.

      • getMemberUuids

        java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getMemberUuids()
        Deprecated. 
        Provide a list of the string representation for the UUIDs of all members in the cluster.
        Returns:
        List if unique ids or an empty List if there is no cluster protocol specified.

      • getThisMembersUuid

        java.util.UUID getThisMembersUuid()
        Deprecated. 
        Provide the unique identifier associated with the node executing this method.
        Returns:
        unique identifier or null if the cluster protocol is 'default'.

      • getThisMembersAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getThisMembersAddress()
        Deprecated. 
        Provide the InetAddress associated with this node. Multiple PRPC nodes may have the same InetAddress. Use getThisMembersUuid() to get unique identifier.
        Returns:
        address associated with this node.
